original_title: The Adventures of the Scrabble People in a Pumpkin Full of Nonsense
overview: A character called Sir Scrabble and two children travel to a land called Nonsense, where education has been forbidden. Sir Scrabble teams up with the residents to defeat an evil ruler, the Muddler, through the power of learning and spelling.
title: The Adventures of the Scrabble People in a Pumpkin Full of Nonsense
